tech.academicRef: View my full academic history and publications on

bio.p1: I am Dr. Jamie Wubben. I operate at the intersection of deep tech and strategic management.
bio.p2: With a PhD in Informatics (Cum Laude), I spent years solving the hardest problems in robotics: how to make swarms of drones coordinate autonomously in unpredictable environments. Today, I apply that same rigor to business automation.
bio.p3: Whether I am writing algorithms for aerial missions or designing an AI workflow for a local business, my focus is the same: Efficiency, Resilience, and Intelligence.

skills.technical: UAV Programming, Swarm Intelligence, Artificial Intelligence, Embedded Systems
skills.strategic: Strategic Management, Operational Efficiency, Cross-Cultural Collaboration
